title: SMB Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the SMB protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the SMB check against.

username.description: The user to log in to the SMB server with.

password.description: The password for the user you wish to log in with.

port.description: The TCP port the SMB server should be listening on.

share.description: The name of the share to connect to.

domain.description: The first label of the domain name for the domain the SMB server is connected to. For example, 'CORP' would be the appropriate value for a domain named 'corp.contoso.com'.

file.description: The path to a file to read on the SMB server.

matchContent.description: Whether the file content must match a defined regex for the check to pass.

contentRegex.description: A regex to be matched by the file content.
